description: Deals %mult%%l0%2%/l0%%l+%%quad%0,25;0,5;%el%1;2%/el%,14;%lvl%%/quad%%/l+%;%dbm%%/mult%%d%d8%/d% + %mult%%EMM%;%l0%1%/l0%%l+%%el%1;2%/el%%/l+%;%lvlm%%/mult% of %eld% damage
name: Damage

description: Target object gains the broken condition for the duration of the spell. Attended objects receive a body save. Broken Item is a Tier 2 condition. Items with the broken condition give a -3 to any checks or stats the item gives
name: Break
help: Gives an item the Broken condition

description: The target of this spell effect must make a body save or have their DR lowered by %mult%%EMM%;%lvlmh%%/mult% for the duration of this spell
name: Penetrating
help: Decreases target's DR. The amount of DR lowered increased per spell level past the first

description: Creatures of the selected type take a %mult%-1;%amm%%/mult% to attack and damage against the target. Creatures of the designated type receive a Body save to ignore this effect each time they attack a target under the effects of this keyword
name: Protection
help: Protects the target from a chosen type of creature

description: Manifest a Physical Barrier with: %opt%%mult%5;%add%%lvl%;1%/add%%/mult%:+:HP;%add%%EMM%;%lvl%%/add%:%EMMh%:DR;%amm%%/opt%. Any damage absorbed by this DR takes away from the barrier's HP pool
name: Barrier
help: Creates a Physical Barrier that blocks damage

description: Gives the target a save (Enchantment and Illusion give Mind, Necromancy Body) or gain the Frightened condition. Frightened is a Tier 2 condition that is a fear effect that causes a character to be terrified and have Defensive Reduction 2 (AC,CMD,Saves)
name: Frightened

description: This grants the target understanding of a situation or location. They do not take a penalty for being untrained in a skill for that situation. Gives a skill per purchase
name: Adapt
help: Skillfully adapt to the current situation

description: Gives the target %mult%%EMM%;%add%%lvl%;1%/add%;%amm%%/mult% temporary HP
name: Absorb

description: Magical force performs a simple task with a skill rank of 0, and a skill modifier of %EMM%. Required tools and materials must be present. For each Action keyword taken either increase the skill rank by 1, increase the complexity of the action by 1 or increase the number of individual forces performing the action by 1
name: Action
help: Perform an action automatically with magic

description: Animates a single object to perform a single task. Object moves with a base speed of 30ft. Object has a skill rank of %mult%%add%0;-1;ammount%/add%;2%/mult% and modifier bonus of %EMM% in addition to the objects quality and enchantment benefits. In combat its duration is 3 steps lower
name: Animate Object
help: Animates an object to perform a task

description: Target takes %add%1;%lvl%%/add%%d%d8%/d% bleed damage. For %EMM% rounds this bleed can't be stopped, unless the appropriate skill check also beats the Save DC
name: Bleed

description: Remove a specified negative condition on the target as long as the condition's level is equal or lower than the spell level. Additionally, the Condition Removal keyword must be purchased a number of times equal to the effective spell level of the effect to be able to remove it. If the condition is from a magical or supernatural source you must make a restoration skill check to remove the condition
name: Condition Removal

description: Conjure a single piece of ammunition for a medium weapon that deals %eld% damage. Each additional time Conjure Ammunition keyword is purchased either increase the number of pieces of ammunition created by %EMM% or increase the size of the weapon by 1 step
name: Conjure Ammunition

description: Conjure a single mundane implement that has no moving parts and can't be used as a weapon. It remains until you no longer have use of it and can be any object less than one cubic foot in volume. Each additional purchase of Conjure Implement either increases the number of items by %EMM% or the cubic feet by %EMM%
name: Conjure Implement

description:
Conjures either mundane or impactful material.
Mundane has duration of Sustained + %mult%%EMM%;10%/mult% minutes (or Permanent if purchased twice) and creates %add%12;%mult%12;%lvl%;%EMM%%/mult%%/add% lf. Oz of a liquid, %add%5;%mult%5;%lvl%;%EMM%%/mult%%/add% ft. of bright light and %add%10;%mult%10;%lvl%;%EMM%%/mult%%/add% ft. of dim light, or %add%5;%mult%5;%lvl%;%EMM%%/mult%%/add% lb. of solid material.
Impactful materials are any materials that you can give you beneficial mechanical effect during battle. Duration is Sustained + %EMM% rounds. Available material is based on spell level
name: Conjure Material

description: Gives the target a save (Enchantment and Illusion give Mind, Conjuration Body) or gain the Dazzled condition. Dazzled is a Tier 1 condition that inhibits a character's ability to react and gives Active Reduction 1 (Attacks and Skill checks)
name: Dazzle

description: Target gains Reinforced %amm% to a single type of save or increases their DR by %add%1;%amm%%/add%. You can choose to affect more than one type of save by increasing the cost of the keyword by 1 for each additional type of save. You may limit what the bonus applies against (ie DR Silver or Will against Mind effects) which decreases the cost of the keyword by 1
name: Fortify

description: Targeted object's hardness increases by %add%1;%mult%%EMMh%;%add%%amm%;-1%/add%%/mult%%/add%
name: Harden

description: Target gets a mind save or the caster gets a +%amm% to a specific type of social skill checks against the target
name: Influence
help: Makes a target more susceptible to your social influence

description: Create an illusion of a simple light source that produces %l0%5 ft of bright light and 10 feet of dim light%/l0%%l+%10 ft of bright light and 20 feet of dim light%/l+%. Shape and type of light is chosen at the time of casting. For each additional purchase of the Light keyword either increase its size, its complexity or increase/decrease the light level by 1 step
name: Light

description: You can manipulate an object within range, interacting with it as if you were manipulating it and even move it if it weighs less than 5lbs and takes up less than a 5ft area. If Manipulate is purchased a second time both limits are increased to %mult%5;%lvlm%;%EMM%%/mult%
name: Manipulate

description: Gives the Inspired %amm% condition to a single Adventurer or Utility skill check to the chosen target
name: Predict
help: Gives a bonus to a single skill check

description: Repairs a targeted object, restoring %mult%%l0%2%/l0%%l+%%quad%0,25;0,5;%el%1;2%/el%,14%/quad%%/l+%;%dbm%%/mult%%d%d8%/d% + %mult%%EMM%;%l0%1%/l0%%l+%%el%1;2%/el%%/l+%;%lvlm%%/mult% hp to it. Can't heal an object above Broken condition unless cast at level 1 or higher, and can't go above Destroyed unless cast at level 3 or higher
name: Repair

description: Allows you to search for a specific object, material, etc. within the range of the spell. If it is targeted, you target a specific spot or object to search. If it has an area, you search the area. If the item is within the targeted area, you get confirmation of that, but do not know the exact location, until you spend an additional round Sustaining the spell. If you mantain for a 3rd round, you are also told the strength or ammount of what you are searching for. The tier of material you can search for is equal to the spell's level
name: Search

description: Gives the target a save (Enchantment and Illusion give Mind, Necromancy Body) or gain the Shaken condition. Shaken is a Tier 1 condition that is a fear effect that causes a character to tremble in fear and have Hampered 2 (AC,CMD)
name: Shaken

description: Creates an intangible visual illusion that must be within a 5 foot cube size (unless one of the words modifies the target area). The illusion can be anything that the caster can imagine and may have simple movements and even mimic taking actions as appropriate. This illusion can move as directed by the caster as long as they are sustaining the spell. Complexity of actions and movements increases with spell level. Creatures that interact with the illusion get a Mind Save to realise it is one. This illusion can have additional aspects based on other illusion keywords added to the spell
name: Shimmer

description: Gives the target a save (Illusion give Mind, Conjuration and Necromancy Body) or gain the Sickened condition. Sickened is a Tier 1 condition that causes a character to feel ill and have Active Reduction 1 (Attack and Skill checks) and Weakend 2 (Damage)
name: Sicken

description: Creates an illusion of a simple sound which happens instantly and can be heard by those adjacent to the target location of the sound. You may purchase Sound keyword additional times to increase complexity and loudness of sound
name: Sound

description: Targeted object's hardness decreases by %add%1;%mult%%EMMh%;%add%%amm%;-1%/add%%/mult%%/add%
name: Weaken

description: The caster targets an object or creature, or an area (if using an AoE keyword), and sets a trigger of their choice to set off an alarm. This alarm can be a mental alarm sent to the caster or an auditory alarm of their choice when the trigger happens
name: Alarm

description: Convers a dead creature into an undead under your control. When targetting a corpse you receive a number of bone or soul points equal to 8 x the CR of the creature to raise an undead. These points may be used to raise an undead, with the cost of the undead equaling its CR x 8; however you can only raise an undead whose Grade and CR is appropriate for a single summon, as if you were using the Summon Creature keyword. You cannot raise an undead above this Grade or CR. In combat the duration is decreased by 3 steps. The bone and soul points may be stored when harvested within a receptacle. If stored, their duration is doubled. A receptacle that is Broken loses half of it's points, a destroyed receptacle loses all of them
name: Animated Dead
help: Animates a corpse as an undead

description: Target gains +1 to Initiative. If Anticipate is purchased additional times increase the bonus by %EMMh% each time
name: Anticipate

description: Changes the cosmetic appearance of the target
name: Appearance

description: Creates basic structures with nearby materials. You can build a structure with an area of %mult%%EMM%;%amm%;5%/mult% feet. Higher spell level increases complexity
name: Build

description: Attempts to Bullrush the target using the Caster Skill in place of the Martial Skill
name: Bullrush

description: Changes target creature's physical form to an appropriate animal decided when the spell is cast that is within %lvl% size category of the target for the duration of the spell. Target gains all the physical attributes and abilities of the chosen creature and may gain supernatural abilities as approved by the GM. They also gain a quarter of the animals hit point pool as temp hp. If the target reaches 0 hp or lower, they immediately change back
name: Change Form
help: Transform a target into another form

description: Gives the target a climb speed equal to their base land speed. For each additional time Climb is purchased it lowers the climb DC by 1 step
name: Climb

description: Target must make a Mind Save or be compelled to take a single action on their next turn. The Command must be simple in nature ('Attack them','Drop Weapons','Kneel', etc.)
name: Command
help: Compells target to do an action

description: Target must make a Mind Save or react more favorably or more hostile to the current situation for the duration of this spell, treating the target as %amm% step(s) more hostile or friendly
name: Compel
help: Compells the target to act differently

description: The target can understand %amm% written or spoken (choose one) language(s) for the duration of the spell
name: Comprehend

description: Conjure a basic set of armor or shield designed with the armor rules. Each additional purchase of Conjure Armor increases the quality by 1 step
name: Conjure Armor

description: Conjure a mundane tool. Each additional purchase of Conjure Tool increases the quality by 1 step
name: Conjure Tool

description: Conjure a basic weapon that deals %eld% damage. Each additional purchse of Conjure Weapon increases the quality by 1 step
name: Conjure Weapon

description: Temporarily take control of an undead that was created with a spell level equal to or less than this spell level for the duration of the spell
name: Control Undead

description: You curse on of the following attributes for the duration of the spell: AC, CMD, single Skill, single Save; giving a -%amm% penalty
name: Curse

description: Gives the target a body save or gain the Defeated condition. Defeated is a Tier 3 condition that represents a character being in a state where they are no longer in fighting shape. The character has their movement halved, and whenever they take a basic action, the character takes a point of damage that cannot be resisted
name: Defeated

description: Changes the cosmetic appearance of the target
name: Appearance

description: Attempts to suppress (or dispel if purchased twice) the target magic effect of equal spell level or lower for the duration of this effect by making an Abjuration check with a DC of 10 plus 4 per effective spell level plus the sources EMM. For every spell level above the target effect increase the bonus to the check by %EMM%. If the target effect is permanent or part of a magic item, this spell must be 2 levels higher than the target to attempt to dispel
name: Dispel

description: Choose either Hot or Cold climate and treat its effects as %amm% step(s) more favorable
name: Endure
help: Lets the target endure hot/cold climat

description: Target weapon increases the damage die track by %amm% step(s)
name: Enhance

description: Target gains a +2 bonus to a single skill from the following list (Acrobatics, Climb, Swim, Fly, Ride). Each additional Enhance Action purchased increases the bonus by %EMM%
name: Enhance Action
help: Gives a bonus to a single skill

description: Increase the speed of a single movement type target possesses by %mult%10;%amm%%/mult% feet. This doesn't change the base speed of the movement
name: Enhance Movement

description: Gives the target a body save or gain the Entangled condition. Entangled is a Tier 1 condition that inhibits the character's physical movement. The character has Unbalanced 2 (Attacks). Entangled can be removed with a Strength or Escape Artist check with the DC of the spell
name: Entangle

description: Increase the size of the target by %amm% step(s)
name: Enlarge

description: Target gains fast healing %mult%%EMM%;%amm%%/mult%
name: Fast Healing

description: The target no longer falls, but floats ignoring falling damage. If you take Fly keyword additional times you increase target's flight abilities, scaling as per the fly rules
name: Fly
help: Makes the target floatier and lets them fly

description: The next time the target object is used in a skill check or activating an ability, it fails. If object is wielded when the spell is cast the wielder gets a Body save to negate this effect
name: Hamper

description: The target object is held shut for the duration of the spell, giving a Body save to the wielder (if any). The DC to open the object is equal to the spell save DC
name: Hold

description: The target must make a Body save or take %mult%1;%amm%%/mult%0% more damage from the next %add%%lvl%;1%/add% attacks. If an energy keyword is purchased, the additional damage is taken as that energy type instead of the damage type of the triggering attack
name: Impacting
help: Makes the target take more damage

description: Conjures a disease with tier of up to the level of the spell that they have knowledge of and apply it to the target as appropriate. The target receives a save based on the disease. This effect has no duration other than the duration of the disease, unless it is applied in an indirect way, then it has base duration of 1 round. Cost of the Infection keyword is increased by the disease's tier
name: Infection

description: Target's weapon counts as a type of material or alignment for the duration of the spell, such as evil, for the purposes of bypassing DR. Each additional purchase of Infuse increases the tier of material or the level of the alignment by 1
name: Infuse
help: Temporarily change target's weapon material or type

description: Target gains Limber %amm% (AC,CMD)
name: Inspire (Limber)
help: Gives a bonus to the target

description: Target gains Steady %amm% (Attacks)
name: Inspire (Steady)
help: Gives a bonus to the target

description: Target gains Strengthen %amm% (Damage)
name: Inspire (Strengthen)
help: Gives a bonus to the target

description: The target can make a skill check or ability check as an immediate action
name: Instant Action
help: Target can instantly do a check

description: The target becomes invisible for the duration of the spell. Performing a hostile action breaks invisibility
name: Invisibility

description: The target is healed for %add%10;-5;%mult%5;%amm%%/mult%;%mult%5;%lvl%%/mult%%/add%% of all damage done within the area for the duration of the effect (requires AoE modifier)
name: Leech
help: Allows the target to heal when anyone takes damage within the area

description: Increases the target's reach by %mult%5;%lvl%%/mult%ft
name: Lengthen Limb

description: You form a link with a target within range, either taking a %min%%mult%25;%amm%%/mult%;100%/min%% of any damage and any conditions they suffer from during the link or take %mult%5;%amm%;%lvl%%/mult% damage that they have suffered from to yourself and restoring it to them at the start of each of your turns. Target must remain within range of the spell for the effects to apply. If they leave the effects stop until they re-enter the range
name: Link (Restoration)

description: You form a link between two targets within range, deciding which direction the link flows with one target either taking a %min%%mult%25;%amm%%/mult%;100%/min%% of any damage and any conditions the other target suffers from during the link or taking %mult%5;%amm%;%lvl%%/mult% damage that the other target has suffered from to them and restoring it to the other target at the start of each of their turns. Target must remain within range of the spell for the effects to apply. If they leave the effects stop until they re-enter the range. Unwilling targets receive a Body save
name: Link (Necromancy)
help: One target suffers another target's damage

description: Conjure magical armor that has %add%%EMM%;-%EMMh%;%mult%%EMMh%;%amm%%/mult%%/add% ACB. This armor has no ACP, Spell Failure or minimum DEX, but does count as worn armor for restriction such as Monk AC
name: Magic Armor

description: Change the markings on the palm sized object as the caster wishes. Additional purchases of Manipulate Markings increase object size. Wielded objects give the wielder a Body save
name: Manipulate Markings

description: The target instantly memorizes a page worth (or more) of information depending on its complexity. Additional purchases of Memorize increase the ammount of information
name: Memorize

description: Target makes a Mind save or forgets what happened during a single event, scene or situation, amount of time depending on spell level. After the end of the duration the target does not regain this memory, but gets a save each time something would trigger it to be recalled
name: Memory Lapse

description: Creates %mult%%lvl%;%amm%%/mult% illusory doubles of the target. When the target of the spell is targetted with an attack roll a die equal to the number of images + 1. Any result other than a 1 hits and destroys one of the doubles
name: Mirror Image

description: Target gains a natural weapon of your choice
name: Natural Weapon

description: Deals %mult%%quad%0,25;0,5;1,14;%lvl%%/quad%;%dbm%%/mult%%d%d8%/d% + %mult%%EMM%;%lvlm%%/mult% of negative damage. This damage type heals undead creatures and damages living ones
name: Negative Energy

description: Deals %mult%%quad%0,25;0,5;1,14;%lvl%%/quad%;%dbm%%/mult%%d%d8%/d% + %mult%%EMM%;%lvlm%%/mult% of positive damage. This damage type heals living creatures and damages undead ones
name: Positive Energy

description: Target gets a Mind save or gains Hampered %amm% (AC,CMD)
name: Penalty (Hampered)
help: Gives a penalty to the target

description: Target gets a Mind save or gains Unbalanced %amm% (Attacks)
name: Penalty (Unbalanced)
help: Gives a penalty to the target

description: Target gets a Mind save or gains Weakened %amm% (Damage)
name: Penalty (Weakened)
help: Gives a penalty to the target

description: Creates a pocket of extradimensional space that can be attached to another object and moved. This pocket can hold %mult%5;%pow%%EMM%;%add%%amm%;-1%/add%%/pow%%/mult% cubic feet of material
name: Pocket

description: Gives the target a save (Illusion give Mind, Conjuration Body) or gain the Prone condition. Prone is a Tier 2 condition that causes a character to fall on the ground and have Hampered 4 (AC,CMD) and Unbalanced 4 (Attacks). Prone target do not gain hampered against ranged attack that are further than 5ft. away, and ranged attacks have disadvantage against prone targets
name: Prone

description: Gives the target a reroll on a save of an ongoing condition they are currently being affected by
name: Reroll

description: Target gains %mult%%add%%EMM%;%lvl%%/add%%/mult% %eld% resistance (requires an elemental keyword)
name: Resistance

description: Gives the target a save (Enchantment gives Mind, Necromancy gives Soul, Transmutation gives Body) or sap a single attribute of the appropriate group, lowering it by %add%1;%lvl%%/add% for the encounter
name: Sapping

description: Deals %mult%%l0%2%/l0%%l+%%quad%0,25;0,5;%el%1;2%/el%,14;%lvl%%/quad%%/l+%;%dbm%%/mult%%d%d8%/d% + %mult%%EMM%;%l0%1%/l0%%l+%%el%1;2%/el%%/l+%;%lvlm%%/mult% of %eld% damage to objects ignoring %mult%%EMM%;%amm%%/mult% hardness. If the amount of hardness ignored is greater than the hardness of the object, the difference is added as damage per dice. Attended objects receive a body save
name: Shatter

description: Creates a magic shield that can be raised as a free reaction %lvl% times per round against an attack and provides %EMMh% AC. Each additional purchase of Shield keyword either increases the number of times it can be raised by 1 or the AC it provides by %EMMh%. This AC bonus is a shield bonus that does not provide DR or stack with shields, but does not count as armor for abilities like Monk AC
name: Shield

description: Decrease the size of the target by %amm% step(s)
name: Shrink

description: Gives the target a Mind save or gain the Unconscious condition for the duration of the spell as long as half their highest skill rank bonus is equal to or lower than the level of the spell. Unconscious is a Tier 4 condition that renders a character unable to act or perceive. The character can take no actions and is Helpless. Helpless is a Tier 4 condition that makes a character unable to defend themselves and makes them valid target for coup de grace
name: Sleep

description: Gives the target a Body save or gain the Staggered condition. Staggered is a Tier 2 condition that inhibits a character's ability to act. The character may only take one basic action while staggered, not both
name: Stagger

description: Summon a single creature with a Grade equal to or lower than your rank in Conjuration skill with CR no higher than 0.5 alternatively, you can summon 1d4 creatures using the same rules, except CR can be no higher than 0.25 (if spell's level is higher than 1 multiply both CRs by %mult%%add%%srb%;-2%/add%;%add%%lvl%;-1%/add%%/mult%). During combat duration is 3 steps lower
name: Summon Creature

description: A target is treated as if it ate a %amm% meal(s) or %amm%/4th of days' worth of water. This can only provide water in terrains that have an excess amount of water
name: Sustenance

description: Gives the target a swim speed equal to their base land speed. Each additional purchase of Swim keyword lets the target treat the current as one step lower
name: Swim

description: The target teleports up to %add%10;%mult%5;%EMM%;%amm%%/mult%;-%mult%5;%EMM%%/mult%%/add% feet to an unoccupied square chosen by the caster. This movement does not provoke. If you can target multiple creatures, the maximum number of additional creatures that may be affected is %lvl%, regardless of other keywords
name: Teleport

description: Modify the target area of terrain (minimum 1 square), adding or removing a form of difficult terrain
name: Terrain

description: Conjures a poison with tier of up to the level of the spell that they have knowledge of and apply it to the target as appropriate. The target receives a save based on the poison. This effect has no duration other than the duration of the poison, unless it is applied in an indirect way, then it has base duration of 1 round. Cost of the Toxins keyword is increased by the poison's tier
name: Toxins

description: Wards the target to alert you if a chosen condition is met
name: Ward

description: Either increase or decrease the target's weight by %mult%25;%amm%%/mult%%
name: Weight
